alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 11 at 9:04PM MDT until March 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Meade County Plains, the Pennington County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing snow may reduce visibility at times. Drifting snow may lead to icy roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
